title: Clinton, Sanders clash on guns, economy, foreign policy
text:
> Top News Clinton, Sanders clash on guns, economy, foreign policy Sen. Bernie Sanders, of Vermont,, left, and Hillary Rodham Clinton laugh during the CNN Democratic presidential debate, Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015, in Las Vegas.
